property.name: indsTitle
property.label: Title
property.description: The Title of the Indicators Card

property.name: indsIcon
property.label: Icon
property.description: enter the SLDS Icon Name available at https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons

property.name: indsHeading
property.label: Heading Text
property.description: Enter descriptive text to appear at the top of the card. Can be blank.

property.name: indFields
property.label: Indicator Field Names
property.description: The Field Names of each Indicator's Value.

property.name: indIcons
property.label: Indicator Icons
property.description: The Lightning Design System name of the icon. Names are written in the format '\utility:down\' where 'utility' is the category, and 'down' is the specific icon to be displayed. Icons can be found here - https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: indTexts
property.label: Indicator Text Values
property.description: The text you want displayed. Separate the Text with a semicolon e.g. 'IN1;IN2'

property.name: indImages
property.label: Indicator Image URLs
property.description: The URLs to the image of each Indicator, separated by a semicolon.

property.name: indHovers
property.label: Incicator Hover Texts
property.description: The Hover Text of each Indicator you want displayed. For multiple Indicators separate the text with a semicolon e.g. 'Hover Text 1;Hover Text 2 2'
